All Classes

  • Class Description
    AmericanoBeverage
    Contains information required to brew an americano.
    Beverage
    Base class for beverages.
    BeverageController
    Interface for beverage controllers.
    BeverageController.State
    Beverage controller states.
    BeverageControllerObserver
    BeverageControllerObservers can receive notifications from BeverageControllers when various events occur.
    BeverageOrder
    A beverage order, which includes the type of drink to make, and, optionally, the condiments to include.
    BlackTeaBeverage
    Contains information required to brew a black tea.
    Button
    A clickable area, which can perform an action if a click occurs within its bounds.
    CoffeeBeverage
    Coffee beverages can extend this class to simplify their implementation.
    CompletedOrder  
    Condiment
    The interface for beverage condiments.
    EspressoBeverage
    Contains information required to brew an espresso.
    GreenTeaBeverage
    Contains information required to brew a green tea.
    GuiApp
    A GUI interface for the Beverage Controller, which uses Swing as its GUI framework.
    HardwareInterface
    An interface into the brewing hardware.
    HotDrinkBeverageController
    A beverage controller implementation that makes hot drinks.
    LatteMacchiatoBeverage
    Contains information required to brew a latte macchiato.
    Main
    Automated interface used to test the Hot Beverage Controller.
    MilkCondiment
    Used to represent a condiment serving of milk in a beverage order.
    MockHardwareInterface
    A hardware interface that does not attach to real hardware.
    ParameterizedBeverage
    A beverage that allows its recipe and name values to be set.
    ParameterizedCondiment
    A condiment that allows its recipe and name values to be set.
    Recipe
    A recipe for a beverage.
    Recipe.Builder
    Used the construct a Recipe.
    ResourceManager
    Loads and stores images.
    ResourceManager.ImageId  
    Spinner<T>  
    Spinner.Builder<T>
    Used to construct a Spinner.
    SugarCondiment
    Represents a sugar added to a drink order.
    TeaBeverage
    Tea beverages can extend this class to simplify their implementation.
    YellowTeaBeverage
    Contains information required to brew a yellow tea.
